description.narrative: Promoting mini-hydro and integrated watershed management to increase grid/isolated-grid/small hydropower capacity

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

receiver-org.narrative: Government of Sao Tome and Principe
Government of Sao Tome and Principe

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: Addressing the barriers to significantly increase grid/isolated-grid-connected mini/small hydropower capacity and to sustainably manage the watershed

comment.narrative:
GHG emissions in the electricity generation sector has increased from 79,080 tons in 1998 to 101,480 tons in 2005. This increase is getting bigger due to a sustained increase in diesel fuel use for electricity generation. The present contribution of hydropower in the electricity generation mix of the country was a mere 8 % in 2013. No investment taking place in the grid/non-grid-connected mini hydropower sector.
No IWMPs are yet developed in the country. No lands restoration techniques implemented in STP. A loss of approx. 1,515 tCO2 every year in the 6,000 ha of forest in the project sites. No large-scale reforestation driven by the GoSTP (private initiative exists, for a commercial purpose).

Comp 1 1.1. Revision of regulatory and legal documents and laws produced and support to the Government for approval and divulgation 1.2 elaboration of the integrated watershed management plans for the Io grande and Manuel Jorge rivers 1.3 Network Mapping of low and medium electric lines 1.4 Regulation on the Supervision of National Electricity system SEN; (Supervision Manual for the SEN, Guide for Investors in Renewable Energies, Legal regime for self-production by renewable sources) 1.5 Increase the country hydrological early warning system through the rehabilitation of Hydrological Stations
Comp 2 2.1 Technical support to government for oversight of the Santo Amaro solar plant construction 2.2 Technical and Economic Feasibility studies for construction of 3 hydro and 1 PV plant 2.3 Procurement and installation of solar PV on rooftop of Ministry of Infra-estructures and natural resources
Comp 3 3.1 Diversification of income generating activities through Promotion of Non-Wood Forest Products in Cantagalo District 3.2 Monitoring of reforested and GSTA areas applied by the project intervention in the last 3 years 3.3
Comp 4 4.1 Implementation of the National Training Plan for Energy Transition 4.2 Outreach campaign for the sustainable management of forest ecosystems 4.3 Communication and Marketing of the Energy project results 4.4.

Comp 1 1.1. Revision of regulatory and legal documents and laws produced and support to the Government for approval and divulgation (team of consultants hired. Revision and improvement of documents in progress) 1.2 Elaboration of the integrated watershed management plans for the Io grande and Manuel Jorge rivers (ongoing, drafts submitted) 1.3 Network Mapping of low and medium electric lines (in progress) 1.4 Recovery of 12 Hydrological Stations to improve early warning system (Diagnostic completed and purchase of equipment ongoing )
Comp 2 2.1 Technical and Economic Feasibility studies for construction of 1 PV plant completed 2.2 Technical report on the feasibility studies for the rehabilitation and expansion of Papagaio MHPP completed + TOR for the recruitment of an EPC firm for the rehabilitation of Papagaio MHPP completed 2.3 Procurement and installation of solar PV on rooftop of Ministry of Infra-estructures and natural resources (EPC firm hired)
Comp 3 3.1 Diversification of income generating activities through Promotion of Non-Wood Forest Products in Cantagalo District ongoing 3.2 Monitoring of reforested and GSTA areas applied by the project intervention in the last 3 years completed
Comp 4 4.1 academic institution hired for the implementation of the National Training plan 4.2 Implementation of the The Communication campaign strategy for Sustainable Forest Ecosystems Management ‘’NON SA OBO’’

Comp 1 1.1. Revision of regulatory and legal documents and laws produced and support to the Government for approval and divulgation 1.3 Network Mapping of low and medium electric lines 1.4 Regulation on the Supervision of National Electricity system SEN; (Supervision Manual for the SEN, Guide for Investors in Renewable Energies, Legal regime for self-production by renewable sources)
Comp 2 2.1 Public consultation for presentation of ESIA report for Papagaio MHPP 2.2 Hiring of EPC firm for Quality Assurance/Oversight of construction of the Santo Amaro PV plant
Comp 3 3.1 Diversification of income generating activities through Promotion of Non-Wood Forest Products in Cantagalo District
Comp 4 4.1 Implementation of the The Communication campaign strategy for Sustainable Forest Ecosystems Management ‘’NON SA OBO’’ 4.2 Terminal Evaluation process 4.3 Elaboration of Lessons learned report and Exit strategy

Comp 1 1.1 Integrated watershed management plans for Io grande and Manuel Jorge rivers completed 1.2 Network Mapping of low and medium electric lines
Comp 2 2.1 ESIA report related to the rehabilitation and expansion of Papagaio MHPP validated after a public consultation event 2.2 Oversight of the Santo Amaro solar plant construction ongoing 2.3 Installation of solar PV on rooftop of Ministry of Infra-estructures and natural resources
Comp 3 Comp 4

Comp 1 1.1. Reforço das capacidades materiais e organizativas do MOPIRNA/DGRNE 1.2. Relatório técnico das características das redes electricas 1.3. Revisão e homogeneização dos Regulamentos (Acesso às redes e interligação;relações comerciais/Contratos de compra e venda de energia eléctrica). 1.4. Normas de Segurança Centros de produção de eletricidade, Subestações e Postos de transformação 1.5. Elaborar o Manual de Procedimentos técnicos e administrativos para a conexão à rede de operadores privados de energias provenientes de todas as fontes de energias renováveis 1.6. Regulamento para emissão de autorização para produtores de consumo próprio; 1.7. Manual/protocolo / regulamento de Fiscalização para o SEN 1.8. Plano Nacional de ação das energias Renováveis em São Tomé e Príncipe e o ATLAS 1.9. Elaboração do Plano de Gestão Integrada da Bacias hidrográficas nas zonas de intervenção (Papagaio e Banzu na RAP e Abade em S.tomé
Comp 2 2.1. Estudo de viabilidade de Aproveitamentos Hidroelétricos e Planta solar PV 2.2. Estudo de impacto ambiental e social EIAS de Rio Papagaio 2.3.Consulta pública do estudo de viabilidade e do EIAS da hidroelectrica de papagaio (C10) 2.4. Elaboração e divulgação de guia de investidor em energias renováveis 2.5. Recrutamento de empresa para elaboração do Estudo de viabilidade + Projecto de execução da MCH papagaio (desenho e do caderno de encargo) 2.6.Consulta pública do projecto de execução
Comp 3 3.1. Continuidade da segunda fase técnicas de GSTA aplicadas aos terrenos declivosos nas comunidades 3.2. Programa de reflorestação implementado para assegurar recursos, rendimentos alternativos e serviços ambientais sustentáveis.
Comp 4 4.1. Implementação do Plano de Formação da DGRNE 4.2. Elaboração do plano de Formação Multisectorial para o sector de energia 4.3. Campanha de divulgação das actividades do projecto

Result 1 1.1. Reforço das capacidades materiais e organizativas do MOPIRNA/DGRNE: completed 1.2. Relatório técnico das características das redes electricas: in progress due to inexistence of electrical grip cartography, the project had to commission it through a new tender that provoked delays 1.3. Revisão e homogeneização dos Regulamentos (Acesso às redes e interligação;relações comerciais/Contratos de compra e venda de energia eléctrica): in progress 1.4. Normas de Segurança Centros de produção de eletricidade, Subestações e Postos de transformação: in progress, tender launched 3 times 1.5. Elaborar o Manual de Procedimentos técnicos e administrativos para a conexão à rede de operadores privados de energias provenientes de todas as fontes de energias renováveis : completed 1.6. Regulamento para emissão de autorização para produtores de consumo próprio; completed 1.7. Manual/protocolo / regulamento de Fiscalização para o SEN: completed 1.8. Plano Nacional de ação das energias Renováveis em São Tomé e Príncipe e o ATLAS: cancelled, UNIDO is doing it 1.9. Elaboração do Plano de Gestão Integrada da Bacias hidrográficas nas zonas de intervenção (Papagaio e Banzu na RAP e Abade em S.tomé : completed, lacking public validation
Result 2 2.1. Estudo de viabilidade de Aproveitamentos Hidroelétricos e Planta solar PV: completed 2.2. Estudo de impacto ambiental e social EIAS de Rio Papagaio: completed only lacking public validation 2.3.Consulta pública do estudo de viabilidade e do EIAS da hidroelectrica de papagaio (C10): will happen in Feb2022 2.4. Elaboração e divulgação de guia de investidor em energias renováveis : in progress 2.5. Recrutamento de empresa para elaboração do Estudo de viabilidade + Projecto de execução da MCH papagaio (desenho e do caderno de encargo): completed 2.6.Consulta pública do projecto de execução: pending additional results: _Construction of the Santo Amaro first solar plant in the country, in partnership with AfDB and UNIDO to produce 10% of National Electricity Consumption : in progress expected to finish April 2022 _ Solar roof tops in hte compound of the Result 3 3.1. Continuidade da segunda fase técnicas de GSTA aplicadas aos terrenos declivosos nas comunidades: completed 3.2. Programa de reflorestação implementado para assegurar recursos, rendimentos alternativos e serviços ambientais sustentáveis:completed
Result 4 4.1. Implementação do Plano de Formação da DGRNE : completed 4.2. Elaboração do plano de Formação Multisectorial para o sector de energia: Plan elaborated, contracted institution for training in January - March 2022 4.3. Campanha de divulgação das actividades do projecto: in progress 4.4 Campaign for the sustainable management of forest ecosystems in place until end of project

In a first phase, preparation of the legal and regulatory environment for investors to enter the energy market. In a second phase, investing in solutions for the efficiency of the renewable energy sector.

Technical and advisory support for the strengthening of key sectors (Directorate General of Natural Resources and Energy (DRNE), Directorate for Support to Agricultural Development (DADA), Directorate of Forests (DIFO), General Regulatory Authority (AGR) National Water and Electricity Enterprise (EMAE) for the development of the hydrological and agricultural sectors.
